name: blog-model-typescript
description: Generated model types for the blog demo in typescript

scripts.dist: rimraf ./dist && webpack -o ./dist --mode none && cp src/domstuff.html dist/domstuff.html && cp src/model/index.html dist/index.html
scripts.dev: rimraf ./dist && webpack -c webpack.config.js -o ./dist --mode none && cp src/domstuff.html dist/domstuff.html && mkdir -p dist/model && cp src/model/index.html dist/model/index.html

author: Tim Boudreau
